lead_paragraph: Serena Williams made the world’s top-ranked woman look like a beginner, beating her nemesis Justine Henin, 6-2, 6-0, in the quarterfinals of the Sony Ericsson Open on Tuesday in Key Biscayne, Fla. Williams won the final 10 games by playing nearly flawless tennis, while Henin unraveled after she double-faulted three times.
